item.title: Anne add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "All I'm saying is, kindness don't have no boundaries." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Anne add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Anne add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "That's what I love about Aibileen, she can take the most complicated things in life and wrap them up so small and simple, they'll fit right in your pocket." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Anne add a quote by kathryn stockett
item.description: "they say it's like true love, good help. you only get one in a lifetime.....there is so much you don't know about a person. i wonder if i could've made her days a little bit easier, if I'd tried. if i'd treated her a little nicer....." -- kathryn stockett

item.title: Anne add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "The beauty of winter is that it makes you appreciate spring." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Anne add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "There is such a place as fairyland - but only children can find the way to it. And they do not know that it is fairyland until they have grown so old that they forget the way. One bitter day, when they seek it and cannot find it, they realize what they have lost; and that is the tragedy of life. On that day the gates of Eden are shut behind them and the age of gold is over. Henceforth they must dwell in the common light of common day. Only a few, who remain children at heart, can ever find that fair, lost path again; and blessed are they above mortals. They, and only they, can bring us tidings from that dear country where we once sojourned and from which we must evermore be exiles. The world calls them its singers and poets and artists and story-tellers; but they are just people who have never forgotten the way to fairyland." -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Anne add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "All grown-ups were once children... but only few of them remember it." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Anne add a quote by Kate Kerrigan
item.description: "Seorang ibu akan selalu khawatir memikirkan anaknya, setiap hari selama hidupnya." -- Kate Kerrigan

item.title: Anne add a quote by Kate Kerrigan
item.description: "..aku sangat diberkati karena bisa menikmati segala cara sederhana yang dia tunjukkan untuk mencintaiku." -- Kate Kerrigan

item.title: Anne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Time will not slow down when something unpleasant lies ahead." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Anne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Anne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Anne add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don't believe in magic will never find it." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Anne add a quote by Susane Colasanti
item.description: "I'd rather be weird and happy than normal and miserable." -- Susane Colasanti

item.title: Anne add a quote by Poppy Z. Brite
item.description: "I believe in whatever gets you throught the night. [...] Night is the hardest time to be alive. For me, anyway. It lasts so long, and four A.M.knows all my secrets." -- Poppy Z. Brite

item.title: Anne add a quote by Richelle E. Goodrich
item.description: "<i>Happily-ever-afters </i>don't come in <i>happily-every-days</i>. They are found at the end of challenges-ever-met, promises-ever-kept, and tears-ever-wept." -- Richelle E. Goodrich

item.title: Anne add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "We all want to be the best at something. Trouble is, some people are only the best at being second best. " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Anne add a quote by Wayne Gerard Trotman
item.description: "You crave winning and fear losing instead of just doing. To succeed you must remove your self-imposed limitations." -- Wayne Gerard Trotman

item.title: Anne add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Anne add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Whether you come back by page or by the big screen, Hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Anne add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton

item.title: Anne add a quote by John Mason
item.description: "You were born an original. Don't die a copy." -- John Mason

item.title: Anne add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Anne add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Anne add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I did then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better." -- Maya Angelou
